scripts.publish: bun run clean:deployments && settlemint scs hardhat script local --script scripts/hardhat/main.ts
scripts.publish:docker: DOCKER_BUILD_TAG=$(jq -r .version ../../package.json); if [ -z "$CI" ]; then DOCKER_BUILD_TAG="$DOCKER_BUILD_TAG-dev.$(date +%s)"; fi; docker buildx build . --file=./Dockerfile --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --provenance true --sbom true -t ghcr.io/settlemint/asset-tokenization-kit-artifacts:$DOCKER_BUILD_TAG --push
scripts.deploy:remote: settlemint scs hardhat deploy remote --deployment-id asset-tokenization
